about_the_game:
How Do We Live After The World Ends?

When Industrial Age tycoons unwittingly unleash another Ice Age, humanity’s last hope are The Renovators: martial craftsmen who must clear perilous forgotten subterranean lairs of traps and monsters for the materials and space to rebuild civilization underground in Warmhavens. Hit things with your hammer; have fun; make amazing bases; try not to die.

Survive a Frozen World

Travel across the map to explore forgotten underground locations that exist between the freezing surface and the molten heat bubbling up from below. Play sources against each other to balance and manage temperature, pollution, light, and technology to create livable spaces. Find and craft equipment, gear, tools, and weapons to help you survive. Gain experience and choose skills and perks when leveling up to be able to survive deeper, darker places.

Defeat What Lurks Below To Reclaim What Was Lost

Battle fierce subterranean denizens, detect and dismantle fiendish traps, and demolish monstrous idols and condemnable structures for resources—all to win back domains that have fallen into evil hands (or tentacles, as the case may be).

Rebuild Civilization Underground

Progress through each lair, using the cleared rooms and resources to build workshops, armories, apothecaries, mushroom farms, dormitories, and all the other facilities needed to comfortably support 250 people at each Warmhaven location. Optimize the base layout and attract the professions that will lead to good health, morale, and renown for each community.

Highlights

  • Survive an Art Nouveau Edwardian ice age
  • Renovate dungeons and move in, not just loot them
  • Gleefully demolish monsters, traps, and ruins
  • Play elements (fire, ice, pollution, darkness) against each other
  • Strategic base design and community management
  • Constant character and base progression
  • Fun solarpunk take on arpg and survival basebuilding genres

name: Dungeon Renovators

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: Dungeon Renovators is a base-builder and action RPG with online co-op. You are a Renovator: combat-ready craftsmen who reclaim dungeons for humanity, demolish evil structures for materials, then build bases to train, craft equipment, attract workers, level up and rebuild civilization!
